class_notes: (after Professional Development experience has been approved by WTM director, director will contact Candler Registrar to have WTM 500 1 added to student's transcript)
course_description: WTM Certificate students are required to fulfill the certificate's professional development requirement through participation in either an academic conference approved by the certificate director (minimum five contact hours) or the WTM Mentoring Program (minimum five contact hours).
